allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: init solution .net10

- Initialize Avalonia UI solution targeting .NET 10 with preview features
- Configure Directory.Packages.props for central package management
- Add XerahS.Avalonia.RegionCapture library project
- Add demo application with DPI-aware manifest
- Set up CsWin32 for native Windows interop
- Include core models: PixelRect, PixelPoint, MonitorInfo, WindowInfo
- Add RegionCaptureService as high-level entry point
- Create OverlayWindow with transparent borderless design
- Implement per-monitor overlay pattern for mixed-DPI support
- Add CoordinateTranslationService for DPI-aware coordinate mapping
- Include Windows-specific NativeMonitorService and NativeWindowService
- Configure for AOT compatibility and SIMD optimization

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement per-monitor overlay infrastructure

- Add OverlayManager to coordinate per-monitor overlay windows
- Implement Strategy B: one overlay per physical screen
- This bypasses mixed-DPI scaling artifacts in single-span windows
- Add RegionCaptureOptions for configurable capture behavior
- Support window snapping, magnifier, and keyboard nudge options
- Overlay manager handles lifecycle and cleanup of all overlays

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: integrate DWM window bounds detection

- Add WindowDetectionService with spatial indexing for fast window lookup
- Use DWMWA_EXTENDED_FRAME_BOUNDS for accurate visual bounds
- Exclude invisible shadow borders from snapping calculations
- Implement window Z-order detection \(topmost first\)
- Add snap edge detection for edge-snapping behavior
- Support excluded handles to ignore our own overlay windows
- Add GetWindowsInRegion and GetWindowsNearPoint utilities
- Implement automatic window list refresh with 100ms cache

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
